snippet: For many recent superwealthy foreign buyers, London is just a stop in a peripatetic international existence that might also include New York, Moscow and Monaco.
abstract: London has become just a stop in a peripatetic international existence for many recent superwealthy foreign buyers; real estate firms report that at least 37 percent of people buying property in the most expensive neighborhoods of central London do not intend them to be primary residences, and many of these foreign buyers are making moves to buy up entire neighborhoods.
lead_paragraph: For many recent superwealthy foreign buyers, London is just a stop in a peripatetic international existence that might also include New York, Moscow and Monaco.

headline.seo: A Slice of London So Exclusive Even the Owners Are Visitors
headline.main: A Slice of London So Exclusive Even the Owners Are Visitors
headline.print_headline: A Slice of London So Exclusive Even the Owners Are Visitors
